"Bret Waldow" <Bret.Waldow@...> wrote:
> I have found a case where jUnit will run a test successfully if I use the
> text ui, but error out if I use either of the guis.  The error shows up as a
> nullPointerException in my code.

Does this still happen if you turn off class reloading in the GUI testrunners?


Erik
